front.title: Dissemination of Flow Specification Rules for IPv6

abstract.t: Dissemination of Flow Specification Rules provides a Border Gateway Protocol extension for the propagation of traffic flow information for the purpose of rate limiting or filtering IPv4 protocol data packets. This document extends I-D.ietf-idr-rfc5575bis with IPv6 functionality. It also updates I-D.ietf-idr-rfc5575bis by changing the IANA Flow Spec Component Types registry.
